subject: You have been approved  Wed, 18 Apr 2007 06:23:28 -0800
body:
Dear Home Owner

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Act now on your loan pre-approval.

You can receive $265.000 for 
$625 per month.

Please respond ASAP.
http://ilook.tw/niiu

 

Jeanne Jefferson
Trust Loan


A cynic is a man who knows the price of everything, and the value of nothing.	Oscar Wilde
